title: Green Day and Radiohead DLC for Rocksmith 2014
description:
This torrent contains the Green Day and Radiohead DLC for Rocksmith 2014.

How to install this dlc:

1. Copy the content of both folders to the dlc folder in your Rocksmith root folder
2. Open the SKIDROW.ini file in your Rocksmith root folder (this file comes with the Rocksmith 2014 DLC crack, available on Piratebay as well)
3. Add the numbers of the songs you want to the [DLC] section of this file:

Number		Song
258378		Radiohead - Creep
258379		Radiohead - Just
258380		Radiohead - Optimistic
258381		Radiohead - Karma Police
258382		Radiohead - My Iron Lung
258364		Green Day - Oh Love
258365		Green Day - Basket Case
258366		Green Day - American Idiot

Make sure the list in your file is kept in the following format:

[DLC]
# List of all DLCs the app should own.
###########################################
# <index> = <appid>
1=248750
2=248752
3=248753
4=248754
5=248755
6=248756
7=248757
8=258341
9=260460
10=260461
11=258378
12=258379
13=258380
14=258381
15=258382
16=258364 
17=258365 
18=258366

Don't forget to place a number in front of the song number, else Rocksmith 2014 will fail to load that song.

Enjoy your new DLCs!
